#summary Show/Set HotSpot system/agent properties
#sidebar TableOfContents

= Introduction =

Show/Set HotSpot system/agent properties.


= Details =

{{{
wget https://hatter-source-code.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/jprop/jpropall.jar
}}}


{{{
Usage:
  java -jar jpropall.jar [options] <PID>
    <PID>                 target JVM pid
    -show <key name>      filter by key name
    -set <key>=<vlue>     set key & value
    -remove <key>         remove key
    --agent               show agent properties
}}}

Sample:
